pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Statistical Quality Control // This package is a toolkit for multivariate process monitoring. It contains the main alternatives of multivariate control chart such as: Hotelling, Chi squared, MEWMA, MCUSUM and Generelized Variance control chart. Also, it includes some tools for assessing multivariate normality like: Mardia, Royston and Henze Zirkler test and the univariate D'Agostino test. Moreover, it possess ten didactic datasets.
